name: nirvana-premium
description: An application about a job portal called Tu Primera Chamba

scripts.dev: docker compose down && docker compose up -d && pnpm --parallel dev
scripts.migrate: docker compose down && docker volume rm --force nirvana-premium_chamba-users-jobs-data && docker volume rm --force nirvana-premium_chamba-iam-data && docker compose up -d && pnpm -F=users-jobs-service migrate && pnpm -F=iam-service migrate
